name: Max Saves Earth - O Preço do Amanhã
name_original: Max Saves Earth - O Preço do Amanhã
description:
Max Saves Earth - O Preço do Amanhã is a strategy game developed by ScalaeStudios. It was originally released in 2022.
Max Saves Earth - O Preço do Amanhã is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
